summary: This bill, HR 2141, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 409 South Hicks Street in Lawrenceville, Virginia, as the "James Solomon Russell Post Office." The bill includes details about the designation, referencing the new name in any legal or official documents. The bill was introduced to the House of Representatives by Ms. McClellan and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform on March 14, 2025.
